post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
저가 일하는 회사에서 intermediate java/j2ee developer를 추천해 달라고 부탁받았음니다.  resume를 제게 보내주세요.

position : intermediate java/j2ee developer
environment: weblogic server 8.1/jboss, oracle,
xml, webservice, jdbc, ejb, ant, uml, xsl,
unix/windows xp/, cvs, ,,,,,
telecommunication, oss
